comments:
Steps:
1.Open 7.0.1 RUP library.
2.Create your own plugin and configuration.Then create a CP in that plugin.
3.DnD any CP from rup plugin into your own CP. There is java exception.
Log file is attached.

Created an attachment (id=45976)
log for deep copy error
This does not happen if it is my own library which does not include rup content.
*** Bug 150058 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Exception occured while replacing text references (see excerpt from the log below). I reassign this to Weiping to take a look.

Created an attachment (id=46134)
Patch for the fix

Some guid strings are not valid regex patterns, that need to be escaped in order to use String's replaceAll method.
